messages.message:
Did someone recently change how Python unit tests are run? I’ve noticed that mypy is now run after unit tests, and another weird behavior I am seeing is that shared utils that rely on certain test libs are now including other internal lib’s tests. for example, the `py-loader-module` only has a few tests, but when running unit tests with `make clean build test`, we see it run more tests:
```test_build_query (instabase.audit_logs.test.test_audit_log_query_helper.TestAuditLogQuery) ... ok
test_invalid_log_type (instabase.audit_logs.test.test_audit_log_query_helper.TestAuditLogQuery) ... ok
test_invalid_time (instabase.audit_logs.test.test_audit_log_query_helper.TestAuditLogQuery) ... ok
test_invalid_time_range (instabase.audit_logs.test.test_audit_log_query_helper.TestAuditLogQuery) ... ok
test_parse_empty_response (instabase.audit_logs.test.test_audit_log_query_helper.TestAuditLogQuery) ... ok
test_parse_response (instabase.audit_logs.test.test_audit_log_query_helper.TestAuditLogQuery) ... ok
test_make_data_query (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_elastic_query_builder.TestElasticQueryBuilder) ... ok
test_make_series_query (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_elastic_query_builder.TestElasticQueryBuilder) ... ok
test_make_split_by_query (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_elastic_query_builder.TestElasticQueryBuilder) ... ok
test_build_num_files_proccessed_query (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_metrics_queries.TestMetricsQueries) ... ok
test_build_num_flow_runs_query (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_metrics_queries.TestMetricsQueries) ... ok
test_build_num_images_proccessed_query (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_metrics_queries.TestMetricsQueries) ... ok
test_build_num_mapped_records_query (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_metrics_queries.TestMetricsQueries) ... ok
test_build_num_ocr_calls_query (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_metrics_queries.TestMetricsQueries) ... ok
test_build_num_pages_proccessed_query (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_metrics_queries.TestMetricsQueries) ... ok
test_build_num_pdfs_proccessed_query (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_metrics_queries.TestMetricsQueries) ... ok
test_invalid_app_name (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_metrics_queries.TestMetricsQueries) ... ok
test_invalid_attribute (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_metrics_queries.TestMetricsQueries) ... ok
test_invalid_metric_name (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_metrics_queries.TestMetricsQueries) ... ok
test_invalid_time (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_metrics_queries.TestMetricsQueries) ... ok
test_invalid_time_range (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_metrics_queries.TestMetricsQueries) ... ok
test_multiple_group_by (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_metrics_queries.TestMetricsQueries) ... ok
test_parse_metrics_response_both_group_by (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_metrics_queries.TestMetricsQueries) ... ok
test_parse_metrics_response_group_by_field (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_metrics_queries.TestMetricsQueries) ... ok
test_parse_metrics_response_no_group_by (instabase.metrics_utils.test.test_metrics_queries.TestMetricsQueries) ... ok```
